title: Patrick Adams shares 'Suits' photos with Meghan Markle to commemorate show ending
text:
"Suits" actor Patrick J. Adams is celebrating the show's series finale, set to air on Wednesday, by sharing some of his favorite throwbacks from previous seasons on Instagram.

Meghan Markle, who played Rachel Zane, Adams' on-screen love interest throughout the show's run, appears in many of the snaps.

The Duchess of Sussex made her official last appearance on the USA legal drama in 2018, at the end of the show's seventh season.

In one of Adams' posts, he wrote, "This week the last episode of Suits will air and the nearly 10 year journey we’ve all been on together will finally be over. So it seems right to post some photos the next couple of days from the early days."

Check out some of the snaps he shared:

At the time of Markle's departure from the show, she shared why she was ready to do so, in a joint interview with Prince Harry after accepting his proposal.

"Keep in mind, I've been working on my show for seven years," she said. "So we were very, very fortunate to be able to have the longevity on a series. And once we hit the 100-episode marker, [I felt] I have ticked this box."

"And I feel really proud of the work I've done there," Markle continued. "It's time to work as a team with [Harry]."

The series finale of "Suits" airs Wednesday 9/8c on on USA Network.
